entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Friday 7 April 2023
